short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly copy selected text from web pages and applications straight into Google Sheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting your creative energy on monotonous copy-pasting. Free up your mental resources for what really matters - analysis, insights, and synthesis. Transfer text to your spreadsheets with a single click, no more tab switching, no more copy-paste hassle.

Say goodbye to:
- Lost data from accidentally closed tabs
- Endless tab searching
- Failed copy-paste attempts
- Losing track of processed content
- Formatting inconsistencies
- Accidental data overwrites
- Eye strain from constant tab switching
- Lost context while juggling between sources
- Mental fatigue after hours of monotonous data transfer
- Exhaustion that kills your ability to think creatively

How does it work:
1. Install the extension
2. Sign in with your Google account
3. Select your target spreadsheet
4. Select the target sheet in the spreadsheet
5. Select text on any web page
6. Click the pop-up button to instantly transfer the text or press Ctrl+Shift+S (on Windows) or ⌃⇧S (on Mac)
7. Move through your content seamlessly—no tab switching needed!

Perfect for researchers, analysts, and anyone working with data collection.

Save hours of manual work. Process your data 2x faster. Keep your mind fresh for creative thinking and meaningful insights.
